title: CHANCE Program | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the site search form , the site home page .           CHANCE Program     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  CHANCE Program      CHANCE Program   Main Menu    About           Our Story    Our Team    CHANCE Scholars    Enroll    Contact Us         Program Services           Student Support Unit – Provides Virtual Advising and Support 24/7    CHANCE Virtual Tutoring – Effective March 30th    Financial Assistance & Information    Calendar of Events         Community Outreach           Our Partners    Recruitment    Early Outreach Initiatives         Resources           Campus Resources    Campus Safety    Career Development    Student Involvement    Student Life         Support CHANCE           CHANCE Alumni Spotlight    Get Involved    Give to CHANCE          Eyebrow menu    Apply to CHANCE    Contact Us    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              CHANCE Program       CHANCE Program              Who We Are             Donate             Apply to CHANCE (UIC Students Only)            Summer Camp Application Extended             Our Story Continues (16) Years Later………… We are still committed to “Opening Doors and Changing Lives!”         About CHANCE   The UIC CHANCE Program was designed to assist the University of Illinois at Chicago with its goal to increase recruitment, retention and graduation rates of underrepresented students.         Stay in Touch With CHANCE via our Virtual Campus 24/7      Chat with CHANCE 24/7    COMMUNITY ALERT: Attention Scholars and Visitors:  Whereas, our university is dealing with the COVID-19 Pandemic the CHANCE Program is still in operation within our Virtual Campus format. Please join us online via the Blackboard Learn Portal or if you need personal, professional or academic assistance please contact us at:  312-355-5025 or email chance@uic.edu.         Summer Camp Application Deadline Extended      Information about deadline extension    Attention Parents and Guardians who are interested in our Summer Camp Opportunities . NOTE: Due to COVID-19 Pandemic our application deadline has been extended to  Friday, May 15th.  For more information and applications details: Visit Early Outreach Initiatives TAB…..         ALL SUMMER CAMPS - Will be delivered in a VIRTUAL (Distance Learning Format)      ATTENTION:  Parents/Guardians/Summer Campers….  Due to the onset of our COVID-19 Pandemic  we are unable to bring our 2020 Summer Campers ON CAMPUS between June – August 2020. We are currently moving our “on-campus” SUMMER PROGRAMMING ONLINE using the following virtual platforms: Blackboard Learn, Google Hang-Outs, Webex and Zoom Videoconferencing.  Our Camp Directors will contact applicants (very soon) with more information regarding this method of instruction.
